name: Tomb Raider: The Times
summary: Tomb Raider: The Times Exclusive Bonus Level is a downloadable bonus level from Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation. it is available only on the PC, and unlike previous expansions, does not require the disc for Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation. The level appears to be based off the title flyby seen in Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation.
